summary: A modest home for starting players.
descriptionHtml:
Installion:
Place the esp file of your desired home in the Skyrim data folder. Make sure it's checkmarked on your next start up. Enjoy!

Dragon Falls Shack is a small, one room shack located just southwest of Dragon Bridge. It is free to use and there's a journal to add a bit of a back story to the place and to let you know why it's unoccupied at the moment.

There's a fast travel marker but you must may your way to the place on foot first to enable it.

Features Include:
Bed is player owned and gives the Rested bonus when used.
A few bits of minor loot that should not respawn.
Storage - 3 Barrels, 1 sack, 1 knapsack, 1 chest, 1 strongbox, and a cupboard - all start out empty and do not respawn.
Crafting - Tanning rack, cooking pot, and wood chopping block.
author: mellowtraumatic
